MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL11 postcode area of Wrexham, affecting properties in Penrallt  and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at midnight due to a fault on the underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:58PM on 22nd Feburary 2021
